DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate whether walk capacity patient intermittent claudication improve home-based 5+ exercise training current recommendation daily walk . The study elucidate potential effect dependent change mitochondrial respiratory capacity , blood flow .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Effects Home-based Five Plus Exercise Training
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed intermittent claudication secondary vascular insufficiency An anklebrachial index 0.4 0.9 . Diagnosed critical limb ischemia Anklebrachial index ( ABI ) > 0.90 < 0.4 Limited exercise tolerance Warfarin heparin usage Underwent vascular intervention last 6 month Active cancer , renal liver disease
